4.title: One Damn Crazy Night
4.plot: Scoop and Shanda get real and get crazy in no holds barred Q&A! Watch them tackle bondage, threeways, and broken va-jay-jays. No question is taboo! Join the movement.

7.title: Taking Care of Each Other
7.plot: Taking care of your loved one makes your relationship last that much longer! But how do you know if you're in a relationship or you're just a booty call? Male or Female: who's the dominate sex? Watch Sex Wars with Scoop and Shanda on tonight's episode to find out!

8.title: Sex Ed 101
8.plot: Bet you never had a sex education class like you'll have on tonight's special episode of Man and Wife!

11.title: The F*ck Up
11.plot: Scoop puts his foot in his mouth, again! But this time, Shanda doesn't laugh it off and forgives so Scoop is forced to do Man and Wife minus the wife.

12.title: The Make Up
12.plot: Scoop shows Shanda the respect she deserves tonight when he reverses roles and spends a day in a woman's shoes Â- literally! Scoop + heels + roses = an episode of Man and Wife you will not want to miss!

16.title: The Climax
16.plot: The ultimate episode of Man and Wife yet!

imdb.plot outline: Fatman Scoop and his wife Shanda are a happily married couple who come from vastly different backgrounds. A two-time Grammy winner, Scoop's loud and boisterous presence makes him one of the most recognizable voices across the airwaves. A mother at age 15, Shanda is a curvy, sexy, soft spoken woman who has spent most of her life passionately working as an HIV/Aids counselor. Together, they are the duo behind this explosive, innovative, mind-blowing, in-your-face, sex and relationship talk show. Inspired by Scoop and Shanda's popular video podcast, www.ManandWife.tv, the show works interactively with the Man and Wife website bringing viewers and their questions front and center. But this is not just a show about talkin' dirty. Scoop and Shanda are fierce advocates of safe sex, responsibility, monogamy, respect, hard work, and loyalty. This is a show about building and strengthening relationships for anyone who's in love or looking for love - with great sex as life's ultimate bonus.
